# CAM::SET_GAMEPLAY_HINT_CAMERA_RELATIVE_SIDE_OFFSET

## Summary
Sets an side offset relative attach parent in metres

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** sideOffset

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Call at the start of the hint to avoid pops.
